idea-plugin.name: OpenTelemetry Diagnostic
idea-plugin.description:
Advanced diagnostic plugin for IntelliJ Platform with OpenTelemetry integration. Features:
  • Export telemetry spans via OTLP to any compatible backend
  • Track exceptions with OpenTelemetry spans
  • Monitor frontend and backend metrics separately
  • Support for remote development diagnostics
Configuration:
  • Set OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_HEADERS environment variable or otel.exporter.otlp.headers system property
  • Optional: Set OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT environment variable (default: https://api.honeycomb.io)
